headline: Why Viatris Inc. (VTRS) Is Plunging So Far In 2025
summary: We recently published an article titled Why These 15 Large-Cap Stocks Are Plunging So Far In 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS) stands against the other large-cap stocks. The big and large-cap stocks have spearheaded the rally in the past two years, but Wall Street’s expectations […]
